comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: This is "White City"   which was also the site of the 1908 Olympics   and more recently a new mall by Westfield.

comment.author: 26689296@N00
comment._content: half the Shepherds Bush entrance (seen lower left corner) survived until 2006 when demolished for the shopping centre - a great loss. The engine sheds still survive in the middle of the site
